reviews.text: Rooms were clean and the service is welcoming. Situated in a great location with restaurants, supermarket and bakery nearby. Parking is also not hard to find.

Hated everything about this hotel, rooms are dated and smelly, walls are so thin you can hear your neighbours. Service is non existstant. Area is dodgy and not a good area. Kettle in room broken and coffee the worst in the world. Seriously do not stay here !

Staff was very welcoming, rooms were clean and with important necessities like lockers, wifi, hygiene sheets,TV, wardrobe, sunlight and coffee.

Good for those who aren't concerned about location being closer to downtown.

Recommended.

This is our second stay here in a month as a transit tourists and on both occasions all staff were so nice and helpful. Rooms were nice and clean, bathroom super clean with hot water. The second time we stayed, we decided to have buffet breakfast and it was excellent. Lots of variety to choose from and fresh.The breakfast was made even more special with a great waiter called Kamal. He was very welcoming, friendly and went beyond for one of the customers sitting on the other table. She asked if there was lime and he said they didnâ€™t have any but went and quickly both a few limes and sliced it for her and added to buffet. I was so impressed. He then offered us to try their new cake  that they will be serving which was so delicious. Thank you Kamal and all the team. Gary and Meli from Australia
Aircon / heating not working properly.  Room was cold in a snowy night. Helpdesk not helpful.
